TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OleDbErrorCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Collects all errors generated by the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is created by <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbException> to collect instances of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> class. OleDbErrorCollection always contains at least one instance of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> class.
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> within the OleDbErrorCollection collection.
[!CODE [Classic WebData OleDbError.Message Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbError.Message Example#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Array"> into which to copy the elements.
Docs.summary: Copies the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection"> into an <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index within the <xref:System.Array>.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> within the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> collection.
[!CODE [Classic WebData OleDbError.Message Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbError.Message Example#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection"> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection">.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection"> at which copying starts.
Docs.summary: Copies all the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection"> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection"> starting at the specified destination index.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> within the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> collection.
[!CODE [Classic WebData OleDbError.Message Example#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbError.Message Example#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets the number of errors in the collection.
Docs.value: The total number of errors in the collection.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Exposes the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method, which supports a simple iteration over a collection by a .NET Framework data provider.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator"> that can be used to iterate through the collection.

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the error to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets the error at the specified index.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError"> that contains the error at the specified index.

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>.
Docs.value: `true` if access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`. The default is `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Object"> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
